game.name: Dark Signal
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dark Signal is an online co-op survival horror game set inside an abandoned space station orbiting a black hole, where you solve environmental puzzles while trying to avoid encounters with anomalous entities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dark Signal is an online co-op survival horror game set inside an abandoned space station orbiting a black hole, where you solve environmental puzzles while trying to avoid encounters with anomalous entities.
